org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class Components.Attachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Components.Attachment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Components

    public static class Components.Attachment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Attachment class to support inline image file generation, raw base64 data, or URLs of image attachments for Observations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(Person person)
        Processes the attachment for the given person. Generates a chart image if the chart configuration is provided. Populates the hash field based on inline data if provided/generated.
        Parameters:
        person - Person to generate the chart for.

      • validate

        public void validate()
        Validates that attachment parameters are valid.
